content:
Azrael Blackwood is a human male paladin who has turned away from the teachings of his order and embraced evil. He is a tall, muscular man with piercing blue eyes and jet-black hair that he wears short and neatly trimmed. He is always impeccably dressed in his plate armor and shield, which he wears with a sense of pride and superiority.

Azrael has a commanding presence and exudes an air of confidence and authority. He is a master of manipulation and intimidation, using his charisma and natural charm to get what he wants. He is not afraid to use force, either, and will not hesitate to strike down anyone who gets in his way.

Despite his evil alignment, Azrael is not reckless or impulsive. He is a patient and calculating individual who carefully plans his actions and considers all angles before making a move. He is not afraid to bide his time and wait for the perfect moment to strike, and he is skilled at playing the long game.

Azrael's devotion to evil has led him to command undead creatures, which he sees as useful tools in his quest for power. He is not afraid to use dark magic and has a wide range of spells at his disposal, including those that inflict pain and suffering on his enemies.

In summary, Azrael Blackwood is a powerful and calculating individual who has turned away from the teachings of his order to embrace evil. He is a skilled manipulator and an intimidating presence, and he is not afraid to use force to achieve his goals.
